titleStmt.title: [An essay to the] celebration of the anniversary day of His Majesties Birth and restitution. May 29, 1630/60.
titleStmt.author: Heath, James, 1629-1664.

notesStmt.note: First 4 words of title suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Twas a rich dress great Englands genius wore ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
